content:encoded:
Topics: Eating Disorders Relapse, Counseling, Sexual Integrity, Emotional Affairs, Newlyweds
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. Jim Burns

Caller Questions:

  1. After you gave me advice for my food addiction relapse, I met with my therapist and uncovered some reasons why. 
  2. My daughter found out her husband talked to other women before their marriage in May. What can she do now that he is deployed? 

Suggested Resources:
Life Recovery Workbook for Eating Disorders
Worthy of Her Trust
Every Man’s Battle
Intimate Deception

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.
